questions.template: {player1} must challenge {player2} to a dance-off! Loser drinks twice.
{player1} must give their phone to {player2}. {player2} can send one text message to anyone in {player1}'s contacts. If {player1} refuses, they drink 3 times.
{player1} must tell an embarrassing story about themselves or drink twice.
Would you rather? {player1} asks {player2} two options. The group votes on which is worse. {player2} must do the winning option or drink twice.
Categories! {player1} picks a category (e.g., car brands). Go around the group naming items. First to hesitate or repeat drinks!
Truth or Dare! {player1} must choose truth or dare from {player2}. Refusing means drinking three times.
Waterfall! {player1} starts, and everyone must start drinking. You can't stop until the person before you stops!
Never have I ever! {player1} starts with 3 fingers up. First to put all fingers down drinks!
